mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.post_id AS "postId", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.remarks AS "remarks", b.title AS "title", u.name AS "createBy.name"
left join bs_post b on a.post_id = b.id and b.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN bs_user u ON u.id = a.create_by and u.del_flag = '0'

a.del_flag = '0'
